*div1 type="summary"* *p*Hamilton N. Yett and Alexander Calvit to Austin, June 6, 1825. Note for payment of dues on land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*In Equal installments of Twelve and Eighteen Months we promise to pay *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* or order Two Hundred and seventy dollars in good property subject to a deduction of 33 1/3 per cent if paid in cash being amount due on one League and one Laber of [land] granted to us by Concession dated *date_mentioned n="08-09-1824">9th August 1824*/date_mentioned* being amt of Fees imposed by the *person_mentioned*Political Chief of the *location_mentioned*Province */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*in the Fee bill published by him *date_mentioned n="05-20-1824">20th May in the same Year*/date_mentioned* for the full payment of which we do hereby obligate ourselves our *person_mentioned*Heirs */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*assigns*/person_mentioned* and do hereby pledge and Mortgage the said Land.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="06-06-1825">6th June 1825*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Hamilton N Yett*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Alexr Calvit*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
